Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Intestinal Diseases/Enterocolitis/Enterocolitis, Neutropenic
Record.Description: A syndrome characterized by inflammation in the ILEUM, the CECUM, and the ASCENDING COLON. It is observed in cancer patients with CHEMOTHERAPY-induced NEUTROPENIA or in other immunocompromised individuals (IMMUNOCOMPROMISED HOST).
